official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Cobaltate(1-), bis[3-[[1-(3-chlorophenyl)-4,5-dihydro-3-methyl-5-(oxo- kO)-1H-pyrazol-4-yl]azo-kN1]-4-(hydroxy- kO)benzenesulfonamidato(2-)]-, sodium.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2007, the duty on Cobaltate(1-), bis[3-[[1-(3-chlorophenyl)-4,5-dihydro-3-methyl-5-(oxo- kO)-1H-pyrazol-4-yl]azo-kN1]-4-(hydroxy- kO)benzenesulfonamidato(2-)]-, sodium.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Cobaltate(1-), bis[3-[[1-(3-chlorophenyl)-4,5-dihydro-3-methyl-5-(oxo- kO)-1H-pyrazol-4-yl]azo-kN1]-4-(hydroxy- kO)benzenesulfonamidato(2-)]-, sodium.
